scripts.build: npm run build:contract && npm run build:web
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run deploy:contract && npm run deploy:pages
scripts.prestart: npm run build:contract:debug && npm run dev:deploy:contract
scripts.start: echo The app is starting! It will automatically open in your browser when ready && craco start
scripts.dev: export PORT=39106 && nodemon --watch contract/src -e rs --exec "npm run start"
scripts.test:rust: npm run build:contract:debug && cd contract && cargo test -- --nocapture && cd .. && craco test
scripts.build:web:testnet: export NODE_ENV=testnet && rm -r testnet && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ && mv dist testnet
scripts.build:web:all: export NODE_ENV=mainnet && rm -r mainnet && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ && mv dist mainnet && export NODE_ENV=testnet && rm -r testnet && parcel build src/index.html --public-url ./ && mv dist testnet
scripts.test: export NODE_ENV=testnet && export CONTRACT_NAME=dev-1641421731569-38860898594754 && jest rest-api.test.js --useStderr --verbose false
scripts.test:1: export NODE_ENV=testnet && export CONTRACT_NAME=dev-1641421731569-38860898594754 && jest rest-api.test.js -t 'Create Event' --useStderr --verbose false
scripts.test:2: export NODE_ENV=testnet && export CONTRACT_NAME=dev-1641421731569-38860898594754 && jest rest-api.test.js -t '10 participant, 1 reward, 10 times' --useStderr --silent false --verbose
